headline: Billionaire David Tepper’s Long-Term Stock Pick: Why EQT Corporation (EQT) Stands Out
summary: We recently compiled a list of the Billionaire David Tepper’s 10 Long-Term Stock Picks. In this article, we are going to take a look at where EQT Corporation (NYSE:EQT) stands against the other long-term stock picks of Billionaire David Tepper. David Tepper’s Appaloosa Management is a multi-billion dollar hedge fund that was co-founded by billionaire Carolina Panthers owner […]
